post:
we are now offering 3 new VPs packages on a low-cost yearly plan please check them out here
https://clancoms.com/index.php/vps

we also will be offering a yearly low-cost windows VPS with full licensing please open a support ticket for that offer

OpenVZ starting at $8.99 year
512MB Ram
2CPU core Intel® Xeon® E3-1270 v3 (3.50 GHz)
30GB Drive
100Mbit port
1 IPv4
Raid10 

OpenVZ starting at $14.99 year
1024MB Ram
2CPU core Intel® Xeon® E3-1270 v3 (3.50 GHz)
60GB Drive
100Mbit port
1 IPv4
Raid10


OpenVZ starting at $19.99 year
2048MB Ram
4CPU core Intel® Xeon® E3-1270 v3 (3.50 GHz)
100GB Drive
100Mbit port
1 IPv4
Raid10

we will also be adding on several new nodes running duel
E5 CPU very soon
